bug.author: barry-jin
bug.summary: [Website] Python API References redirect to 404 (1.6.0 Release)
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
Some hyperlinks of tutorials in <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/1.6/api/python/docs/api/gluon/index.html>python API/mxnet.gluon (1.6.0 Release)</denchmark-link> leads to 404, Including Gluon Guide, gluon.Parameter, gluon.Trainer, gluon.model_zoo.vision. <denchmark-h:h3>Error Message</denchmark-h>
404 Page <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Try to access these contents through <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/gluon/index.html>master branch</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
(Paste the commands you ran that produced the error.)
<denchmark-h:h2>What have you tried to solve it?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
We recommend using our script for collecting the diagnositc information. Run the following command and paste the outputs below: <denchmark-code>curl --retry 10 -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/master/tools/diagnose.py | python
# paste outputs here </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Welcome to Apache MXNet (incubating)! We are on a mission to democratize AI, and we are glad that you are contributing to it by opening this issue. Please make sure to include all the relevant context, and one of the @apache/mxnet-committers will be here shortly. If you are interested in contributing to our project, let us know! Also, be sure to check out our guide on <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/community/contribute>contributing to MXNet</denchmark-link> and our <denchmark-link:https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MXNET/Developments>development guides wiki</denchmark-link> .
These broken links were only fixed in master branch, need to backport to v1.6.

Fixed the broken links on gluon index page v1.6 website, please verify. link: <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/1.6/api/python/docs/api/gluon/index.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/1.6/api/python/docs/api/gluon/index.html</denchmark-link>
